For the first steps in heart rate training

  • You will hear an audible alert for the desired heart rate during your workout
  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of your target training heart rate zones
  • You will also see information about calorie consumption per workout
  • You can see data for 10 workouts

Client reviwes
John
2 half marathons
I didn't know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial capabilities. After a while I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation I turned to the same place.
New goals - new gadgets.
Thank RunSmart.
Ivan
1 half marathon
A cool thing is a heart rate monitor. Usually I ran without them. It turns out that I only did worse to myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and received a training session as a gift. We had the first training session with me, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead, and with them prepared for my first half marathon! Thanks
Mark
2 half marathons
For a long time I could not start running, because before that I started several times, but it became hard and I quit. I heard from friends about RunSmart and running with heart rate control and decided to give it a try. I called, the guys asked about my goals and found a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! I have already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and does not intend to stop. Thanks.
Run Smart
